description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Popular Tales ... Illustrated by ... C. Hammond. With an introduction by Anne Thackeray Ritchie", "Single Works" Author: Edgeworth, Maria Contributor: HAMMOND, Chris - Miss Contributor: Ritchie, Anne Thackeray Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012624.g.4." Page: 254 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1895 Publisher: Macmillan & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001035613 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
